name: TheAtlantic
text: "It is tempting to say that Sessions and Barr were both Trumpists avant la lettre, but their eventual conflicts with him show there was no such thing: Trumpism is a cult of personality, and policy is always an afterthought," writes @GrahamDavidA: https://t.co/kWRSvaN1pu

name: TheAtlantic
text: John le Carré "wasn’t just a medicine man of the English imagination; he was a stylist, too," James Parker writes. "Perfectly weighted descriptive sentences, with just a flicker of dour lyricism." https://t.co/FmZfGl5hGk
